attributes.action: Sack all MPs if BREXIT isn’t fulfilled by the 31st October 2019
attributes.background: MPs have failed the public with the promise date of the 31st March 2019, then postponed till 12th April 2019 again failed to fulfill the public’s vote to leave. This was again postponed until the 31st October 2019. We the public that voted to leave want to leave no later than the 31st October 2019.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. This includes petitions asking for people to lose their jobs.
